title: Printing presses and engineering: one of our own kind
creator_credit: John Edwards, Peter Baylis, Leslie Sansom and Vickers Films
brief_description: Documentary on printing in Yorkshire, Town of Otley, iron casting and printing press made in the 1880s and mass produced in Leeds for distribution overseas. Printing from paper to bottle caps and uptodate methods. Narrated by Anthony Quayle.
